comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: I talked with Travis and this break is due to the tests reliance on implicit credentials for a WinRM remote loop-back connection.  This issue has been addressed in PR #2362.

title: HostUtilities.Tests.ps1 "InvokeOnRunspace method on remote runspace" fails in appveyor (daily build)
